pkgmetadata.longdescription: **Surgeo** is an impelmentation of the Bayesian Improved Surname Geocode (BISG) model created by Mark N. Elliot et al. and incluenced by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's (CFPB) implementation of the same. It also includes an implementation of the Bayesian Improved First Name Surname Geocode (BIFSG) model created by Ioan Voicu.
